= emcas =

== basic ==

Meta is Alt key, not Win key, or Mod4 key.

* C-x C-c    quit
* C-x C-s    save file(update write)
* C-x C-f    find file

* C-x 2      split frame
* C-x 3      vsplit frame
* C-x o      move to other window
* C-M-v      scroll down other window?

* M-x list-packages to install package from internet
click at install button, then install it.

* C-c C-s   run command(in SML mode, run sml)
* C-d       finish command(just as exit)
